attributes.action: Promote localism, work life balance and protect the enviroment: Create work centres based on locality so that people have a community to work in without travelling huge distances thus cutting down on car reliance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: create work centres for office workers to 'hot desk' in an enviroment of thier convience regardless of company employed. Home workers require a community to work in, but wish to stay local to reduce travel and conduct local needs (i.e attend children). These centres will provide basic work equipment and the technology to work virtually as if in a 'normal' place of work. Social networks can be established, this is one way to encourage 'local' working without the need to travel and pollute the enviroment
